content: Has anyone successfully installed a GNSS device on Mac OSX 14 (Sonoma)? I have a Columbus Data Logger USB GPS and have installed the PL2303 driver from the Apple App Store but no success getting data from it.
We need more guidance from MacOS users about this, so that the manual can be updated.
I'm going to try some bluetooth GPS receivers since the USB interface isn't working.

John, I added a PDF to this section, so we can add and interprete those details for our new screenshots etc.
See imprimer OpenCPN Networking Repeater to Tablet PDF https://opencpn.org/wiki/dokuwiki/lib/exe/fetch.php?media=opencpn:manual_basic:set_options:connections:imprimer_opencpn_networking_repeater_to_tablet_pcs.pdf
I added text and a screenshot to QuickStart > Connection > Global Navigation for MacOS using a Bluetooth GPS and posted a change to Status & Progress.
